title: Efficient Numerical Methods for Solving Partial Differential Equations in Applied Mathematics
authors: Sharma, A., Patel, R., & Johnson, M.
abstract: This paper presents novel numerical methods for efficiently solving partial differential equations that arise in various applications of applied mathematics. We demonstrate superior convergence rates and stability properties compared to existing methods.

title: Machine Learning Approaches to Solving Complex Mathematical Optimization Problems
authors: Kumar, V., Singh, N., & Zhang, L.
abstract: We explore how machine learning techniques can be applied to solve complex mathematical optimization problems that are difficult to address using traditional methods.

title: Stochastic Analysis of Financial Market Volatility Using Fractal Mathematics
authors: Mehta, S., Wilson, J., & Rodriguez, M.

title: Advances in Cryptographic Techniques Based on Number Theory and Abstract Algebra
authors: Gupta, R., Thompson, E., & Chen, H.
conference: Annual Symposium on Applied Mathematics and Cryptography

title: Mathematical Modeling of Epidemic Spreading Using Non-Linear Differential Equations
authors: Patel, A., Kumar, S., & Nair, V.
abstract: This research presents a novel mathematical model for epidemic spreading based on non-linear differential equations, with applications to COVID-19 data analysis.

title: Topological Data Analysis Methods for High-Dimensional Data Visualization
authors: Verma, P., Smith, J., & Anderson, T.

title: Computational Geometric Methods for Mesh Generation in Scientific Computing
authors: Mishra, R., Patel, S., & Johnson, R.

title: Quantum Computing Algorithms for Solving Linear Systems of Equations
authors: Shah, N., Wang, Y., & Kumar, A.
conference: International Conference on Quantum Computing and Applications
